summary:
Add a nice looking breton women by the name of Ellana in the bannered mare of whiterun shes a nightblade specialist and is expert both at using poison blades and magic (she also carry a potent weapon by the name of viperfang) 

Ellana can be both married and partnered as a follower and start availlable of the beginning of the game
descriptionHtml:
Add a nice looking breton women by the name of Ellana in the bannered mare of whiterun shes a nightblade specialist and is expert both at using poison blades and magic (she also carry a potent weapon by the name of viperfang) 

ellana perks are as fellow
Alchemist (80)
armsman (40) (she is somewhat average at using her sword but it makes up for her behing able to use deadly venoms not to mention that her blade itself is venomous and may at time poison the target 1/8 of the time. if that happens the foe will slowly die from a painfull damage over time venom)
Concentrated poison (yes she can use the same poison several time)
Sneak (20)
Silence (no mather if she run she wont show you up)
agile defender 40 (she is fine with light armor)

Ellena Spells are as fellow

Healing
Lightning bolt (she use her sword in her right hand while she may shoot bolt using her left one)
Summon fire atronach

She level up using the Nightblade skill set wich means she raise in destruction alchemy (a lot in alchemy) blade and slightly in stealth and light armor 
Her stat are scaled on the player current lvl from 1 to 100 so shes gunna be fellowing you the whole game time

Ellana can be both married and partnered as a follower and start availlable of the beginning of the game

I was bored looking for a nice looking breton fellower so i created my own like i did for my khajiit fellower


Recommanded modes:
Dimonised UNP female body dim face for the removal of the ugly bars on the forehead (you can go without but i still heavily recommand it)
author: coolster
